brand.title: Brand
brand.description: Manage your brands here. You can add, edit, or delete brands as needed.

formDialog.createDescription: Add a new brand to your product catalog

deleteDialog.title: Delete Brand
deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete {name}?
deleteDialog.permanentRemove: This action will permanently remove this brand from the system. This cannot be undone.
deleteDialog.hasProducts: This brand has {count} products associated with it. You need to reassign or delete those products before deleting this brand.
deleteDialog.warningMessage: Please be careful, this operation cannot be rolled back.
deleteDialog.cannotDeleteMessage: This brand has {count} products associated with it. Reassign or delete these products first.
deleteDialog.successMessage: The brand "{name}" has been deleted successfully
